kvhc.gui

Class GUIController

  • java.lang.Object
    • kvhc.gui.GUIController

  • public class GUIController
extends java.lang.Object
    Master class of the GUI.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GUIController

        public GUIController(Activity activity)
        Constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • removeChannel

        public void removeChannel(int channelIndex)
        Removes a channel with the specified index.
        Parameters:
        channelIndex -

      • toggleSolo

        public void toggleSolo(int channel)
        If the channel already is playing solo this method ends the solo and unmute all other channels. If the channel don't play solo this method mute all channels except the given.
        Parameters:
        channel - the id of the channel to toggle solo on

      • getSoloChannel

        public int getSoloChannel()
        A method for getting the id of the channel that playes solo. Returns -1 if no channels are playing solo.
        Returns:
        The id of the channel that plays solo or zero if no Channel is

      • stopSolo

        public void stopSolo()
        If solo-mode has been enabled previously, this resets the solo-variable. solo represents a channel number if it is higher than or equal to 0.

      • reloadSong

        public void reloadSong(Song song)
        Reloads a given song. Calls numerateSteps so all the steps isn't step number one.
        Parameters:
        song - the Song to reload

      • setSpike

        public void setSpike(int channelId,
            int stepid)
        Sets the steps velocity to 100%, the two neighbors to 70% and the neighbors neighbors to 30%. Activates the mentioned steps.
        Parameters:
        channelId - on which channel to set the spike
        stepid - on which step to set the spike

      • clearAllSteps

        public void clearAllSteps()
        Stops Playback and clears all steps. Redraws all Channels.

      • redrawChannels

        public void redrawChannels()
        Redraws all the Channel and their steps and their ChannelButtons. This is done when adding or removing steps. It redraws all the channels and steps, this is not really necessary. THIS IS VERY OPTIMIZABLE

      • updateButtonGUI

        public void updateButtonGUI(int channelId)
        Update the name on the GUI-button
        Parameters:
        channelId -

      • invalidateAll

        public void invalidateAll()
        Method for invalidating all elements in the channel container. This fixes some trouble we had on non-Samsung phones.

      • onStop

        public void onStop()
        Call onStop.

      • onDestroy

        public void onDestroy()
        Call onDestroy.

      • createAndShowLicensesDialog

        public void createAndShowLicensesDialog()
        Shows the license(s) in a Dialog. Reads a textfile from res/raw, creates a simple dialog and puts the read text in the dialog.

      • createAndShowSaveSongDialog

        public void createAndShowSaveSongDialog()
        Creates a SaveSongDialog and shows it.

      • createAndShowLoadSongDialog

        public void createAndShowLoadSongDialog()
        Creates a LoadSongDialog and shows it.
